descriptionHtml:
2000 years ago an evil god was sent to oblivion and his powers was sealed inside a mystic wall.2000 years later you foud this wall upon your journey.While exploring this mystic wall you absorbe all the power sealed inside it.Now you are using that power the way you want.

===Adds===
200000 extra health, magicka, and stamina and also you can carry anything you want without slowing down.Your health, magicka, and stamina will regenerate by 200000 per second.

===Instalation===
1.Copy the file to your Skyrim base folder (look for TESV.exe)
2.Launch the game
3.As soon as you are able to press the tilde key (~)
4.Type in: bat Ultimate

===Uninstall===
Simply go into the Skyrim base folder and delete \"Ultimate.txt\"

please don\'t judge me too harshly.This is my first mod.
author: e180391
